deal_id: From St Paul's to St Peter's - London to Rome
title: From St Paul's to St Peter's - London to Rome
inclusions_evidence: • "Meals: 11 Breakfasts & 2 Dinners." • "Transport by air-conditioned motorcoach with free Wi-Fi" • "Selected guided sightseeing" • "Eurostar train from London to Paris" • "boat ride to St. Mark’s Square." • "Airfares & transfers are additional."

items.label: Guided sightseeing / coach transport / Eurostar / Venice boat ride

other.notes: Unable to price individual sightseeing, coach transfers, Eurostar segments, or local activities for DIY because the deal text does not list exact hotels, dates, star-rating, or specific supplier names for each stay/transfer.

reasoning: The Flight Centre package clearly excludes international airfares ("Airfares & transfers are additional.") and does not list specific hotels or travel dates in the supplied text, so a reliable DIY total cannot be calculated. The package includes substantial services (11 breakfasts, 2 dinners, coach transport, Eurostar, guided sightseeing, Venice boat ride) which add value versus booking hotels only, but without hotel names, dates, and supplier classes it is not possible to produce accurate booking.com/expedia comparisons. Given the inclusions but flights extra, I rate it a 6/10 pending full itinerary and dates to confirm true DIY cost comparison.
additional_notes: I attempted to fetch the Flight Centre product page to extract full itinerary/hotel names but the live fetch did not succeed from the tool. To produce a top-10-quality DIY comparison I need the exact itinerary (dates), hotel names or star-rating per night, and departure city (for flights). With those I will retrieve current booking.com/expedia/supplier prices and return precise savings and sources.
